q1: Is "You'll Never Walk Alone" a good motto for the Liverpool soccer team?
a1: Yes, "You'll Never Walk Alone" is the theme song of the Liverpool soccer team.
q2: no, I like livertown pool party time
a2: Perhaps you could suggest it as a replacement.
q3: Where can I access the theme song? I am interested to know what it sounds like, maybe it could be a great motto
q4: "You will never walk alone" is a great motto for the team as it commits them to always play together
a4: Yes the motto "You'll never walk alone" really commits the team to play together. It always provokes a positive reaction from the players on the pitch
